channel.description: The personal website of Murera Gisa.

item.title: Critical Analysis of the Household Socio-Economic Status on Childhood Stunting in Rwanda

item.description: This research paper has been presented at Fifth International Conference of East African Business and Economic Watch (5th EABEW-2022) held at Kigali June 16th-17th 2022).

item.title: Text Mining for Public Sentiment Analytics in the National Bank of Rwanda

item.description: This research paper has been published at African Economic Research Consortium (AERC|2021). Which is the most active research and capacity building institutions in the world with a focus on Africa.
